thinking: The first turn should focus on building a barracks as per the suggested strategy. Since the base already has 5 resources, the worker should build the barracks near the base to enable training units in the following turn. I will locate a suitable position for the barracks.
The ally base has enough resources to build a barracks. Build it near the base to protect it.
The ally base has 5 resources. Building a barracks is the highest priority.
The ally base has enough resources to build a barracks. Building a barracks will allow for unit production. The barracks will be built near the base at (3,1).
The ally base has 5 resources. It should build a barracks at (3, 1).

The current turn is 700, which is later into the game. Since the Barracks has not yet been built, it needs to be prioritized. Check the base resources, and if there are at least 5 resources, attempt to build the Barracks.
The ally base at (2, 1) should train a worker to gather resources. There are enemy workers nearby, but gathering resources is more important to start.

Okay, let's start by building a barracks. I have one available worker and an available base. The base has 4 resources, and a barracks costs 5, so I need to harvest first. After harvesting I will attempt to build a barracks near my base. After the barracks is built, I will produce a heavy unit to attack the enemy.
The highest priority is to build a barracks so I can train units. I have enough resources to build a barracks. Since the base does not have enough health, I will harvest to replenish it.
The ally base has 4 resources. I need 1 more resource to build a barracks. I will have the base produce a worker. Then, I will have the worker harvest resources from (0,0) and return them to (2,1).
The ally base has 3 resources. The ally worker is idling. I will instruct the worker to harvest resources from (0,0) and bring them back to the base at (2,1).
The highest priority is to build a barracks so that I can start training units. The base has enough resources to build a barracks. I will use the worker to build a barracks near the base.
My base is damaged. I should try to get a worker to harvest and rebuild the base. However, there are too many enemy workers around, so I will have the base attack an enemy worker.

The ally base at (2, 1) only has 2 HP left. I need to protect it and get some workers. I should start by spawning some workers, even though the base is low on health. Then I should probably focus on economy.
The ally base is at (2, 1) and has low HP (2). Defend it by attacking nearby enemy workers. There are multiple enemy workers nearby, attack the closest one.

The ally base at (2, 1) is low on health. It should probably start producing workers again. The base can be healed by having workers harvest and bring resources to it. Need to harvest to get more resources.
The ally base at (2, 1) is damaged. It has 3 resources and the enemy base is at (5, 6). I will order the base at (2, 1) to train a worker to try to repair the base.
The ally base is under attack and low on HP. I need to move the base away from danger.
